Welcome to the Shoe Store Android Application 

This App is part of the Kotlin Android Developer nanodegree. 

You will find code in here that demonstrates navigation with Fragment and basic HVVM architecture.

1. You can click existing items to edit them 

2. You can press the Floating Action Button to add a new item to the list 

Each item contains information regarding shoe title, shoe size, description, company and a list of image descriptions. 

There are some images available for each type of shoe. By defining a shoe type, the first image description on the images list gets filled with that item description. 

The first image description if it matches one of the available images the list shows that image. If it does not, it shoes the default image (Mens Shoes)
In order to add or commit any changes to a shoe item, all fields must have a value
